Posts.Content: My mother and sister are both Breast Cancer surviors, But during the begining stages they went through depression and anxiety, As a therapist in Hypnosis, I was able to relax the thoughts, which in turn, helped them believe in themselves and connect on having a future. to this day, I give mom and my sister sessions in hypnosis to keep there mind and body feeling positive, as I always tell them we are what we think. Presently, I live now in europe, but I am fortunate to work with hospitals around the globe, helping people reduce anxities and fears, the Doctors I work with in Oncology, have said it has been a real compliment to the patients treatment. I blessed to have this gift to share and help others. for the Greater Good, Gregge
Posts.Title: What helped my Mom, and Why I do it today
